name: SpeedWarfare
description:
SpeedWarfare is  a game where you have to be the fastest and kill the most ennemis to have the best score!

This game has been made for the  UE4Jam summer 2019.

Team Name:

Vukiland

Team member:

Alexis Vuk

The following asset has been used to do the game:

- Annimation Starter Pack (from UE Store)

-  FPS Template from UE4

- Sci Fi Weapon Silver pack from UE Store

- Top Down SciFi pack :https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/top-down-sci-fi
